type: TS LF Trading Bot Error - Cancel Order Unexpected Error

definition.text: An Unexpected Error occurred while trying to cancel an order at the exchange. The LF Trading Bot continued running after reporting this error.

paragraphs.text: The process of canceling an order involves sending a request to the exchange via its API. There are many different reasons why the process may fail. Some of those reasons are under your control, and some are not. Some may involve temporary unavailability of the exchange servers, communication and network errors, or other issues.

Find below the error details. They may help you understand the nature of the problem and maybe solve it should it be within your reach. The LF Trading Bot features logic to handle unexpected errors to continue operating despite their occurrence.
In the following section, you will find the information recorded when the error occurred.
You will only see the information if you opened this page as a result of the error actually occurring.
